answers.answer: Hi,you could have something called gastroparesis, which can be a complication of diabetes.  Have you seen a doctor about the problem?How well is your diabetes controlled?  YOu will need extra good control.  Get tested for Celiac and make sure they rule out other non-diabetes related cuases for your pain.Small regular meals, of easily digestible foods.

Additionally, it could be associated with your liver, a bile obstruction, or other internal organs having issues. Included in this list is drug toxicity [drug interactions]. As sally asked, "How well is your diabetes controlled?"

question: hi im 42 years.i am diabetic.i have severe abdomen pain.gastric pain.what can i do to stop my gastritic problem
title: gastrtis
